timeline.message:
Store vaadin hash to node_modules (#8282)

To notice outside changes to package.json
better we add the hash to node_modules
so we can cross check the value.

Fixes #8182
fix: check for TypeVariable in the ExplicitNullableTypeChecker (#8316)
Remove vaadin home test as it's not applicable for 3.0

Close UI after refreshing the page in PreserveOnRefresh case and mark it
(#8365)

Fixes #8286


# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/router/internal/AbstractNavigationStateRenderer.java

Close client app on change location (#8334)

Fixes #8177

Correct Javadocs for adding JS and Stylesheets programatically. (#8392)

* Correct Javadocs for adding JS and Stylesheets programatically.

Fixes #8320

Listen detach events on "listenOn" components in shortcut registration
(#8391)

Fixes #8247
# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/component/ShortcutRegistrationTest.java

Don't override initial value of hidden HTML Element attribute. (#8419)

Fixes #8100

timeline.bodyText: Reduce the number of conditional operators (4) used in the expression (maximum allowed 3).
timeline.author: vaadin-bot

timeline.bodyText: Reduce this lambda expression number of lines from 21 to at most 20.
timeline.author: vaadin-bot

timeline.message:
Removing deprecated parameter from DataNode constructor (#8325)

If you use container (such as the latest Wilfdly) which forces to use significantly newer version of Jsoup than Vaadin depends to, this can cause a problem as deprecated method as been removed.
